titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the program of grants for the prevention and control of sexually transmitted diseases.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Clean Bill H.R.4915 Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee in Lieu.

bill.summary: 6/24/1987--Introduced. Revises provisions of the Public Health Service Act relating to grants concerning acquired immune deficiency syndrome and concerning sexually transmitted diseases. Authorizes appropriations for sexually transmitted disease projects and programs for FY 1988 through 1990.
